name: AlleyCat (RichaThomas)
description:
ALLEYCAT

The baddest Cat in whole damn Town!

A Life of Adventure ,Crime and Living on the edge,....The story of the ALLEY CAT.

Genre : Endless Runner

Gameplay

> Avoid Guards

> Steal Food on the barrels by jumping

How To

Use Left and Right Arrows to move 

Use Space bar to jump on the barrel to steal the food

Use Mouse cursor to Click on menu (If the mouse cursor is missing please use windows key, which will give back mouse control)


TechTools

Unreal

Houdini - Used to generate the procedural elements for the game , like terrain, foliage , building system.

WeathersystemPlugin

LowPolyCats

MedivalPack

FantasyOrchestral

FarmAnimalSounds

WeLoveIndiesSounds

DreamscapeSerise
